name: Light Slowbro
author: Tomokazu Komiya
flavor_text: If the Shellder attached to its tail becomes separated, this Pokémon reverts to a normal Slowpoke.

attacks.name: Fish Out
attacks.effect: Your opponent may choose up to 3 Baby Pokémon, Basic Pokémon, and/or Evolution cards from his or her discard pile and shuffle them into his or her deck. Either way, you may do the same.

attacks.name: Splash About
attacks.effect: If there are more Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon than to Light Slowbro, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage. If not, this attack does 20 damage.
